CustomField.formula: IF( Data_Quality_Score__c =100,"All Account Details Captured", "Missing: " &IF( ISBLANK( Name),"Name-","")&" " &IF(ISBLANK( Organisation_Trading_Name__c), "Registered Business Name-","")&" " &IF( LEN(Phone) = 0, "Phone-","")&" " &IF( ISBLANK( Email__c) , "Email-","")&" " &IF( ISBLANK(Website), "Website-","")&" " &IF( ISBLANK( BillingStreet & BillingCity& BillingState& BillingPostalCode ) , "Billing Address-", "")&" " &IF( ISBLANK( ShippingStreet & ShippingCity& ShippingState& ShippingPostalCode ) , "Shipping Address-", "")&" " &IF( ISBLANK( Shipping_DPID__c) , "Physical DPID-", "")&" " &IF( ISBLANK( ParentId) , "Parent Organisation-", "")&" " &IF( ISBLANK( DUNS_Number__c ) , "DUNS Number-","")&" " &IF( ISBLANK( Growth_Rate__c) , "Growth Rate-","")&" " &IF( ISBLANK( Target_Markets__c) , "Target Markets-","")&" " &IF( ISBLANK( Situation__c) , "Situation-","")&" " &IF( ISBLANK( Opportunity__c) , "Opportunity-","")&" " &IF( ISBLANK( ABN__c) , "ABN",""))
CustomField.label: Data Quality Description
